meanings.definition: A type of primate found in Madagascar.
meanings.sent1: Lemurs are cute animals with big eyes.
meanings.sent2: I saw lemurs at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The lemurs were having a party in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The lemurs moved through the forest like shadows.
meanings.sent5: The lemurs' playful antics entertained the visitors.

meanings.sent1: There are many lemurs in the wildlife sanctuary.
meanings.sent2: The lemurs were climbing and jumping around.
meanings.sent3: The lemurs decided to throw a surprise birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The lemurs' chatter filled the forest with life.
meanings.sent5: The lemurs' fur was soft to the touch.
